static Root* Root::root (  )  [inline, static]

Use this function to get a pointer to the single Root object in the simulation.

This function asserts that such an object has actual been constructed to avoid having to perform that check everywhere the root is used. This is to allow calling the functions below.

Returns:
Pointer to the single root object.
